Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: The recent rejection of my allocation plan by Hiroshi Tanaka further deteriorates my reputation as a trustee. This rejection highlights pre-existing concerns regarding my trustworthiness and my perceived ability to create balanced and fair proposals. Given that my allocation plan suggested a profit-sharing model of 70/30, it may have appeared unbalanced to potential investors, especially considering the criticism I have faced in previous transactions. I must critically re-evaluate my approach to ensure that future proposals are more equitable and regain the trust of investors. My recent rejection rate underscores ongoing challenges in establishing reliable connections within the investment community.
